author: trustin
msg: Fixed: Asn1CodecEncoder doesn't merge when ASN1 codec generates a collection of ByteBuffers. (DIR-108)
Fixed: IoAdpater's default ProtocolEncoderOutput.mergeAll() doesn't check the number of the cumulated bytebuffers

author: trustin
msg: * Fixed: SSLHandler.unwrap() cannot unwrap if the buffer contains multiple encrypted chunks.
* Separated unwrap() into unwrap() and unwrapHandshake()

author: antonio
msg: Mark Pizza support as deprecated. To be removed in 2.2
